mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders(orders.Customer_id,orders.Order_condition,orders.create_time) SELECT customer.Customer_id,'未发货',NOW() FROM customer WHERE customer.Username=#{username};

INSERT INTO order_details(order_details.Order_id,order_details.Goods_id,order_details.Num,order_details.Sum_price) SELECT MAX(ALL orders.Order_id),shopping_cart_details.Goods_id,shopping_cart_details.Num,shopping_cart_details.Price FROM orders,customer,shopping_cart,shopping_cart_details WHERE customer.Username=#{username} and orders.Customer_id=customer.Customer_id and shopping_cart.Customer_id=customer.Customer_id and shopping_cart.Shopping_cart_id=shopping_cart_details.Shopping_cart_id GROUP BY shopping_cart_details.Shopping_cart_details_id
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM shopping_cart_details WHERE shopping_cart_details.Shopping_cart_id= (SELECT shopping_cart.Shopping_cart_id FROM customer,shopping_cart WHERE customer.Username=#{username} and customer.Customer_id=shopping_cart.Customer_id);
mapper.update: UPDATE customer, shopping_cart, shopping_cart_details, goods SET goods.Stock=goods.Stock-Shopping_cart_details.Num WHERE customer.Username=#{username} and customer.Customer_id=shopping_cart.Customer_id and shopping_cart.Shopping_cart_id=shopping_cart_details.Shopping_cart_id and goods.Goods_id = shopping_cart_details.Goods_id;
